content:
Keryx Reference Implementation

  • Notification Framework + APIs: Java, C, C++

  • Event Distributor

  • Simple notification transport protocols (TCP and UDP)

  • Generic Notification Viewer

    • support for specialised plugins for specific event types

  • Open Notification & Transfer Syntax

  • Transfer Syntax published as Internet Draft

  • Source code available for non-commercial use
